FuncDef: The display igmp invalid-packet verbose command displays statistics about received invalid IGMP messages and details about these messages. The display igmp invalid-packet verbose command displays statistics about received invalid IGMP messages and details about these messages.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays details about a specified number of latest received invalid IGMP messages.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 100. By default, the command displays details about all received invalid IGMP messages.
